item.title: Summer Video Game Design
item.description: Quick Links Gamestar Mechanic Unity Game Engine Blender 3D Unity Scripts Public Domain Textures Projects Unity Bowling Roll A Ball Turbo Roll A Ball Blender Basics Unity FPS Blender Character Basics   About the Class Students in video game design will study what it takes to make a good video game. Students will learn the different elements of video games and the design process using a variety of tools. Final projects will include a variety of 3D games.

item.title: 8th Grade Video Game Design
item.description: Quick Links Class Calendar Class Form Gamestar Mechanic Unity Game Engine GameMaker Studio Piskel Pixel Art Editor Projects Breakout Top Down Game   About the Class Students in video game design will study what it takes to make a good video game. Students will learn the different elements of video games and the design process using a variety of tools. Final projects will include a variety of games in both 2D and 3D.
